name: Railworks 2: Train Simulator
summary:
This new version of Railworks contains a range of new features and enhancements, including enhanced menus, the new RS Cab Control driver interface and new RS Career System scenarios.
RailWorks 2 features the same routes and content as the original game, and only one new route: TestTraK, based on the Test and validation centre, Wegberg-Wildenrath, a German testing facility that is used to test the performance and driving characteristics of the trains.
